DPRK-China Cooperation in Public Health and Medical Science 
    Beijing, September 1 (KCNA) -- A 2004-2005 working plan for cooperation in public health and medical science was signed between the ministries of Public Health of the DPRK and the People's Republic of China in Beijing Wednesday.
 Present at the signing ceremony were the members of the DPRK delegation of public health led by Minister of Public Health Kim Su Hak, DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Jin Su, the executive vice-minister of Public Health of China, and Chinese officials concerned.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nicaraguan President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nicaraguan President
    Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Nicaraguan President Enrique Bolanos Geyer.
 The gift was conveyed to President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam Wednesday by new Nicaraguan Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Harry Agustin Bodan Shields.
